| ------------ | ---
| Bug Fix?     | yes/no
| New Feature? | yes/no
| New Plugin?  | yes/no
| New Theme?   | yes/no
| Tickets      | Fix #... <!-- prefix each issue number with "Fix #", if any -->
| License      | MIT

**PR Has**
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Adheres to PMS Coding Standards
- [ ] Code is compatible with MIT License
- [ ] Tests added or updated
- [ ] `bats` tests pass
- [ ] `shellcheck` run on modified scripts
